name: Balls of Virtue
description:
An entry for a 4 hour Corona Blitz event.

Two player, head-to-head competition to see who can click their virtue balls the fastest. Players must click from zero to nine in order.

I ran out of time to add any polish to the game, so it's really just a beginning framework. No menus or text. If you want to restart the game, you have to reload it.

https://itch.io/jam/corona-blitz-2017-01
